"},{"text":"Moneo Shamir","underlined":true},{"text":"
"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Moneo slows mining and flying when durability is low."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.moneo_shamir.1"}]}]

sections.name: page_1
pages: ["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"The Moneo Shamir is found on Aluminium Bands. It can be placed onto tools, shears, and elytra.\n\nLow durability tools will cause mining fatigue, and low durability elytra will cause slowness and blindness."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.moneo_shamir.2"}]}]
